dc:title: East Twelfth Street
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Impressions of her new neighborhood on 12th street. Describes the coldness of a state funded nursery in the neighborhood and the impression made on her daughter by an Italian church across the street.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 38 1932-11-30 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
